    Version 1.4.0
    Changelog

Set content-type and accept headers.

Source: R/headers.r
content_type.Rd

These are convenient wrappers aroud add_headers().

Usage

content_type(type)

content_type_json()

content_type_xml()

accept(type)

accept_json()

accept_xml()

Arguments

type

A mime type or a file extension. If a file extension (i.e. starts with .) will guess the mime type using mime::guess_type().

Details

accept_json/accept_xml and content_type_json/content_type_xml are useful shortcuts to ask for json or xml responses or tell the server you are sending json/xml.

Examples

GET("http://httpbin.org/headers")
#> Response [http://httpbin.org/headers]
#>   Date: 2022-06-08 13:48
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json
#>   Size: 295 B
#> {
#>   "headers": {
#>     "Accept": "application/json, text/xml, application/xml, */*", 
#>     "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, gzip, br", 
#>     "Host": "httpbin.org", 
#>     "User-Agent": "libcurl/7.68.0 r-curl/4.3.2 httr/1.4.3.9000", 
#>     "X-Amzn-Trace-Id": "Root=1-62a0a893-2a52319b0a3c0845762a33d9"
#>   }
#> }

GET("http://httpbin.org/headers", accept_json())
#> Response [http://httpbin.org/headers]
#>   Date: 2022-06-08 13:48
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json
#>   Size: 263 B
#> {
#>   "headers": {
#>     "Accept": "application/json", 
#>     "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, gzip, br", 
#>     "Host": "httpbin.org", 
#>     "User-Agent": "libcurl/7.68.0 r-curl/4.3.2 httr/1.4.3.9000", 
#>     "X-Amzn-Trace-Id": "Root=1-62a0a893-53deb0a408c95fbe6800b073"
#>   }
#> }
GET("http://httpbin.org/headers", accept("text/csv"))
#> Response [http://httpbin.org/headers]
#>   Date: 2022-06-08 13:48
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json
#>   Size: 255 B
#> {
#>   "headers": {
#>     "Accept": "text/csv", 
#>     "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, gzip, br", 
#>     "Host": "httpbin.org", 
#>     "User-Agent": "libcurl/7.68.0 r-curl/4.3.2 httr/1.4.3.9000", 
#>     "X-Amzn-Trace-Id": "Root=1-62a0a893-22b9f99326cd5b9746121b24"
#>   }
#> }
GET("http://httpbin.org/headers", accept(".doc"))
#> Response [http://httpbin.org/headers]
#>   Date: 2022-06-08 13:48
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json
#>   Size: 265 B
#> {
#>   "headers": {
#>     "Accept": "application/msword", 
#>     "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, gzip, br", 
#>     "Host": "httpbin.org", 
#>     "User-Agent": "libcurl/7.68.0 r-curl/4.3.2 httr/1.4.3.9000", 
#>     "X-Amzn-Trace-Id": "Root=1-62a0a893-68dd0cbb276969b333a6a686"
#>   }
#> }

GET("http://httpbin.org/headers", content_type_xml())
#> Response [http://httpbin.org/headers]
#>   Date: 2022-06-08 13:48
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json
#>   Size: 335 B
#> {
#>   "headers": {
#>     "Accept": "application/json, text/xml, application/xml, */*", 
#>     "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, gzip, br", 
#>     "Content-Type": "application/xml", 
#>     "Host": "httpbin.org", 
#>     "User-Agent": "libcurl/7.68.0 r-curl/4.3.2 httr/1.4.3.9000", 
#>     "X-Amzn-Trace-Id": "Root=1-62a0a893-41a19ad82129927a2a346bc8"
#>   }
#> }
GET("http://httpbin.org/headers", content_type("text/csv"))
#> Response [http://httpbin.org/headers]
#>   Date: 2022-06-08 13:48
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json
#>   Size: 328 B
#> {
#>   "headers": {
#>     "Accept": "application/json, text/xml, application/xml, */*", 
#>     "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, gzip, br", 
#>     "Content-Type": "text/csv", 
#>     "Host": "httpbin.org", 
#>     "User-Agent": "libcurl/7.68.0 r-curl/4.3.2 httr/1.4.3.9000", 
#>     "X-Amzn-Trace-Id": "Root=1-62a0a893-1b45ff3e77c1c92a2f495378"
#>   }
#> }
GET("http://httpbin.org/headers", content_type(".xml"))
#> Response [http://httpbin.org/headers]
#>   Date: 2022-06-08 13:48
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json
#>   Size: 335 B
#> {
#>   "headers": {
#>     "Accept": "application/json, text/xml, application/xml, */*", 
#>     "Accept-Encoding": "deflate, gzip, br", 
#>     "Content-Type": "application/xml", 
#>     "Host": "httpbin.org", 
#>     "User-Agent": "libcurl/7.68.0 r-curl/4.3.2 httr/1.4.3.9000", 
#>     "X-Amzn-Trace-Id": "Root=1-62a0a893-298111536e4a4e604a3f5ef7"
#>   }
#> }
